title: iPhonePCSuite-1.0.4
description:
It&#039;s called iPhone PC Suite !

Forget about iTunes.......This beats iTunes !!

The Most complete application on XP for everything iPhone...!!!

Description:
Download & Upload pics to and from PC and iPhone for......

Camera Roll- works 100% (upload / download)

Calendar- works 100% (upload / download)

Contacts- works, has some language translating issues (upload / download)

SMS- works mostly....

Photos- works 100% all in FULL RESOLUTION !!!! (upload / download)

Notes- works 100% (upload / download)

eBook- works 100% (upload / download)

Call log- works 100% (upload / download)

SMS Chat- works 100%, send SMS to someone from PC through iPhone

Safari, bookmark management, works 100% (upload / download)

Apps- **Keep using "Installer" in your iPhone.**
the ones in this app are very buggy and some are PXL.

Finder- works 100%, very useful (upload / download)

Backup/Restore- works 100%, a MUST....

Sound Themes- works... (upload / download)

Ringtones- works 100%, they wont get deleted when synced with itunes !!! and the app converts them automatically...!!

SMB Themes- works 100%

iPod Music Player
- create/delete/rename playlists. works 100%
- copy music to/from iPhone/PC works 100%, drag/drop with your mouse!!
- copy movies from PC to iPhone works 100%, drag/drop with your mouse!!
- while copying movies iPhone PC Suite also does the converting,
- you need to put the video file in a playlist for iPhone&#039;s iPod to "see" it...

You can even install and preview SummerBoard themes on the iphone...!!
